apple_vendor_description: This affectionate emoji on Apple devices depicts two individuals sharing a tender kiss, with one presenting a dark skin tone and the other a medium-dark skin tone, rendered with Apple's signature smooth gradients and realistic lighting. Their forms are softly rounded, creating a sense of intimacy and warmth, while the subtle blush on their cheeks adds a touching detail. It beautifully symbolizes love, deep affection, and romantic connection between a couple with diverse skin tones.
